subject: JUnit 4.1 - Inheritance
msgSnippet: Hey folks, I ve been searching for an answer to this problem, but I cannot seem to find one.  Perhaps I m just special?  :)  Specifically, I ve defined a base
messageBody:
Hey folks, I've been searching for an answer to this problem, but I
cannot seem to find one. Perhaps I'm just special? :) Specifically,
I've defined a base class with setup and teardown methods that are
supposed to be called before and after all tests are run. To do this,
I'm using the @BeforeClass and @AfterClass annotations. I then extend
this base class, which can have a local setup/teardown, and the tests in
them. When I run it, I get an exception stating that the base class's
setup method should be static.

Note: I'm using Eclipse and the JUnit 3.8.x runner. My test classes
have the static suite method that utilize the JUnit4TestAdapter.

Mike
